mapper.select: select sa.*,sa.id as sa_id, sav.*,sav.id as sav_id, IF (ssav.sku_id, 1, 0) AS isChecked from pms_product_sale_attr sa join pms_product_sale_attr_value sav on sa.product_id = sav.product_id and sa.sale_attr_id = sav.sale_attr_id and sa.product_id = #{spuId} left join pms_sku_sale_attr_value ssav on sa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id and ssav.sale_attr_value_id = sav.id and ssav.sku_id = #{skuId}
